      • openOrImport

        public static Project openOrImport(java.lang.String path,
                                   Project projectToClose,
                                   boolean forceOpenInNewFrame)
        Parameters:
        path - project file path
        projectToClose - currently active project
        forceOpenInNewFrame - forces opening in new frame
        Returns:
        project by path if the path was recognized as IDEA project file or one of the project formats supported by installed importers (regardless of opening/import result) null otherwise

      • confirmOpenNewProject

        public static int confirmOpenNewProject(boolean isNewProject)
        Returns:
        GeneralSettings.OPEN_PROJECT_SAME_WINDOW GeneralSettings.OPEN_PROJECT_NEW_WINDOW Messages.CANCEL - if user canceled the dialog

      • confirmOpenOrAttachProject

        public static int confirmOpenOrAttachProject()
        Returns:
        0 == GeneralSettings.OPEN_PROJECT_NEW_WINDOW 1 == GeneralSettings.OPEN_PROJECT_SAME_WINDOW 2 == GeneralSettings.OPEN_PROJECT_SAME_WINDOW_ATTACH -1 == CANCEL
